channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- DellEMC System Update - DSU
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- DellEMC System Update - DSU

item.title: CVE-2022-22554|2024-09-16T20:36:32.257Z -- dell -- dellemc%20system%20update%20-%20dsu
item.description: Dell EMC System Update, version 1.9.2 and prior, contain an Unprotected Storage of Credentials vulnerability. A local attacker with user privleges could potentially exploit this vulnerability leading to the disclosure of user passwords.
